# Admin Dashboard Extension

A [Flarum](http://flarum.org) extension. This extension redesigns the admin dashboard.

### Installation

```sh
composer require datitisev/flarum-ext-dashboard
```

### Updating

```sh
composer update datitisev/flarum-ext-dashboard
```
